trends: There has been one other sighting in Pittsfield
There were no other sightings in Pittsfield on or around August 1st 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a Very long craft moving through space at around 12:15 am in Illinois, but I am sure this craft could have been seen by anyone in the U.S. that was watching the sky that night. It had two lights one on each end that could be seen. The craft blocked the light of distant stars as it flew between closer ones or at least this is how it appeared to me. As this ship neared the constellation scutum there was this bright flash of light it then moved directly toward were the flash appeared. It seemed as if the flash had created a hole and the craft seemed to travel into it. This sighting lasted approx. 5 minutes, it moved from north to south.
Summary: Very long craft moving through space with 2 visible lights.
